channel.title: [508] Ventonix [Beta]
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/211piyd.png[/img] [/center] [center] [b]Ventonix is originally known as TinyScape.[/b] [/center]
[b] Ventonix a 508 private server which was originally known as TinyScape. This thread will pretty much be a server development, except I will be posting a download link for you to download and use the server. I will be adding bits of content and fixing previously known bugs, and then releasing it to the public. I will continue to do this until I decide to finish the project and work on something new(maybe). I know that this server is pretty buggy and I will do my best to fix these issues in future releases though. [/b]
[center] [b] Version 1 Version 2 Version 2.5 Version 3.0 Version ??? Version ??? Version ??? [/center]
[center] [b] [size=20pt]Features[/size]
Player Combat NPC Combat All combat skills working (Obviously, Summoning may need work) Cooking Simple Firemaking Half working Fletching (Need to make the interface buttons do something) Woodcutting RuneCrafting Fishing Mining Smithing Agility (Having a problem with the area though, it crashes the client whenever you go there :/) Most food edible (Will add more next release) Potions work with effects Teleport tabs work Fixed Home teleport glitch (Crashing client) Most, if not, all magic spells work Ancients Magic Lunar Magic Rewards Chest at home (Kill bosses for crystal keys to claim rewards. I've not added the drops yet, so just add them yourself). Portals at home leading to cities New Dialogue system (Old one needs deleting, but first, all the NPC's current chats need putting in the newer one). Grand Exchange (Kinda weird and buggy :L). Better clan chat. Fight caves (I forgot to make the entrance teleport you in.. lol). Trading Bank tabs / Banking Grahams Event Manager Prayers work Some Area music Some weapons have their attack sounds Membership Castle Wars HD Support Simple mini-challenge (Collect an orb from KBD for a wizard located at home and receive 100k in return). Emotes (lol) Working world map
There's more but I loveing hate typing. [/center]
[center] [b] [size=20pt]Media [/center] [center] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/mkc96c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/9umagp.png[/img] [/center] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2i936lf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2586z9f.png[/img] [center] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/168st8y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2guih5y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/23wp9g6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2v146qg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/28k4tg5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2d0lw2h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/11hxfyv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2gtcegp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2kk2ma.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/6stnpf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/300v0b5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2djv5uc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/okajp4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/ejww8y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/muen3r.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/dvk3o4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/24lpmbp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/28vw00g.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/poqo8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/lxvu0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/35k0cb5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/25qswn8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/ouwphz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2yvugsn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/dytxmu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/90a61i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/50lxt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/ekbj7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/5zh6bn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2nv9ilw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2rqiuxv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/30cvx2o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2v18ay0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/n49ukp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/672ofp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ic1ow4.png[/img] [/center]
[center] [b]Server Credits:
Myself Bulby Friend
[b]Ventonix Client Credits:
Jagex Ashley
[b]HD Client Credits:
Jagex DemonWars
[b]Version 1: Server+Client Package: Unavailable
Version 2: Server: Unavailable Client [LD]: Unavailable
Version 2.5: Server: Unavailable Client [LD]: Unavailable
Version 3.0: Server: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=pm;sa=send;u=577476]Send PM[/url] Client [LD]: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=pm;sa=send;u=577476]Send PM[/url] [/center] [center] [code=changelog] Started on a new base - 4/11/12 - Added event manager - 4/11/12 - Removed a lot of useless code - 4/11/12 - Re-created Commands class - 4/11/12 - Added leveling up(level 126) - 5/11/12 - Added simple combat - 7/11/12 - Added object loading - 7/11/12 - Added Added Trading - 8/11/12 - Added Banking and Bank Tabs - 9/11/12 - Re-added better Clan Chat - 10/11/12 - Added Shops - 12/11/12 - Fixed a few combat glitches - 13/11/12 - Started NPC combat (start) - 18/11/12 - Increased combat level to 138 - 21/11/12 - Added food eating - 21/11/12 - [/code] [/center]
